billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Holds a person who willfully fails to collect, account for, and pay tax liable
summary: Holds a person who willfully fails to collect, account for, and pay tax liable; defines "passive investor" to mean an investor who does not play an active role in the business.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the failure of a responsible person to collect and pay over withholding tax
